|rad1chip2 = Intersil;ISL3684; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The FCC label notes the device as a ''11Mbps Smart Wireless Ethernet Adapter''. :[http://www.ferimex.com/download/Manual/WL-299C/WL00-299C.pdf SparkLAN WL-299C manual] ::Default IP: 192.168.5.99 ::Default credentials: '''blank''':'''blank''' This device was sold by '''EthoStream''' as a ''11Mbps Wireless LAN AP Client''. :00:90:4B OUI ('''[[Gemtek]]''') "109-600-8400" and "WL678F_V01" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos.
"109-700-9900" and "WL299C_V01" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. [[Category:English Documentation]]
